@fatalangel79

Use peerblock and you won't get letters from your IP.

@fatalangel79
I've used peerblock without fail for years, and have still received 2 infringement notices.  One recently for Game of Thrones.  PeerBlock is not 100%, but it helps ALOT.  Especially if you add to and customize your lists -- http://www.iblocklist.com/
